First of all, we have to be aware of our own security. It is important learning how to defend ourselves in the time of danger. Besides, if we get helpful hands out there, it will become easier to protect victims and prevent crimes. 
Best wishes.

To be honest with you, for the case of hijack, police department has to be sincere with their duties. They have high tech devices to track and find people. Its like a piece of cake for them, but they prefer to smoke weed in the office.

Hajacking of Mobile devices is a common issue in Dhaka City. If there was a way to built GPS that works without internet and with the phone turned off, i believe finding the phone would a lot easier for police -- since its easier, they might want to be more inclined to help.

For the case of rape, it is a bigger problem that is directly associated with how our culture and mindset has changed over time.

The insecure and uncontrolled access of pornography to mass people has been a key thing that might have accelerated the rape incidents.

If we could implement mandatory -pre-installation of Web browsers or Software that monitors and blocks such vile content, i believe the problem could be reduced to some extent.
